answers.answer: Dr told me that at 38weeks also I was 1cm. I'll be 39this Friday so well see how my cervix is today and decide if to have induction Friday or not.  Though alot of ladies are against inducing and letting baby come natural. I have a feeling I would go past 40weeks because yes I have mild back cramping more braxton Hicks and a bit of vaginal preassure but I'm still like walking around shopping etc
I hope everything goes well for you and your baby. I'm feeling a lot of pressure down below and experience more BH at night I think if I don't get induced I will go past the 40 week mark as well.
Im 39 weeks today but I didn't get checked last week. I have an appointment tomorrow and if my cervix is ready ill be induced on monday :) good luck ladies
Im 36.5 weeks 60% thinned out and 1cm dialated... good luck to you ladies hopefully I go into labor on my own if not I want to be induced

Going past 40 weeks is really quite normal....40 weeks is an average meaning that equal amount of women have baby at 38weeks as do at 42weeks. I don't understand inducing unless medically necessary. Ie preeclampsia or something. .
Being induced GREATLY increases your chances of csection.

A baby is on time if it comes between 36-42 weeks. If baby comes before is early if after its late.   But I do understand how you ladies feel I was induced 3 times to hurry baby because I was uncomfortable... two of those times I begged like my life depended on it.  With my 5 th baby I begged and my new Dr said no my midwife even begged with me for the Dr to approve it. I was mad then but he made the best call for me and baby.. I am glad he did now I would of had to give up giving birth at the birthing center and that was the best experience ever..  if you can wait I suggest it but if you can't there is nothing wrong with that. Don't feel bad because people think you should wait because this is your labor. Your birthing experience...  I hope your baby decides get a move on for y'all I am uncomfortable and I am only 10 weeks....

Im getting induced because I had a stillborn before and its  best if im in the hospital though the whole labor to be monitored. Even if that wasn't the case I don't understand why people feel the need to put their two cents in. If you don't believe in getting induced then don't do it. There's no point in putting others down. Especially if you don't know the situation. Thanks expecting6thbaby I hope you have a good pregnancy :)

question: 1 cm dilated 40% effaced dr said if she doesn't come on her own then I can be induced next week:)
title: 38 weeks today
